businessProfile.name: Anthony's Pizzeria
businessProfile.address: 655 Fairview Rd Ste A, Simpsonville, SC 29680, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 655 Fairview Rd Ste A, Simpsonville, SC 29680, USA

reviews.text:
Service and staff were very polite and respectful. The restaurant was very clean with plenty of space. Parking was free and plentiful.

Food.... The wings were... Good? The wings were cooked well but absolutely no where near enough sauce. I should not have to pay extra money to get enough sauce for wings. They do a VERY light glaze of the wings with the sauce and that's it unless you pay nearly 3$ extra. Which I find crazy honestly. The pizza was good and like I mentioned, the wings were good...but...no where near enough sauce at all. I'd come back but I guess I'd be forced to pay for extra sauce.

I had lunch at Anthony‚Äôs Pizza on Fairview Rd. in Simpsonville this week and was very impressed! The staff was extremely attentive, and my food was prepared quickly and came out absolutely delicious. The manager, Heather, was so sweet ‚Äî she walked around the dining room several times checking on patrons, making sure drinks were refilled and that everyone had what they needed. The entire restaurant was clean, organized, and welcoming.

If you‚Äôre in the area and looking for a great spot for lunch or dinner, I highly recommend stopping in. Everything looked amazing, but I especially suggest trying the Greek salad with lamb ‚Äî it was outstanding! I‚Äôll definitely be back for lunch again soon.

I get the tre colori with light sauce and basil instead of spinach. BEST pizza I‚Äôve ever had. They also have the best ranch!
I won a free medium pizza in a text lottery. They let me upgrade it to a large tri colori! With basil, of course. üòÅü•∞ I tell anyone and everyone about Anthony‚Äôs!  Awesome food, awesome atmosphere, awesome service. Every time.
Great food. Calzone was HUGE! And the fried mushrooms were amazing.  Hard working staff.

Always reliably super delicious.  We always get spaghetti with meat sauce and meatballs and lasagna with meat sauce.  A family favorite! Service is always prompt and super friendly.  We love Anthony‚Äôs!

editorial_summary.overview: Longtime mom-&-pop parlor in a shopping center with New York-style pizza & other basic Italian eats.

recentReviews.text: Had the supreme pizza. Outrageous delish
We Love our Simpsonville Anthony's Pizza !! All the staff are WONDERFUL  - the Food is Awesome - it's always clean and well kept !! We continue to go back !!!
To go order was cold when picked up 5 minutes early.  $30 for the pizza is  ridiculous... Especially cold pizza.

Service and staff were very polite and respectful. The restaurant was very clean with plenty of space. Parking was free and plentiful.

Food.... The wings were... Good? The wings were cooked well but absolutely no where near enough sauce. I should not have to pay extra money to get enough sauce for wings. They do a VERY light glaze of the wings with the sauce and that's it unless you pay nearly 3$ extra. Which I find crazy honestly. The pizza was good and like I mentioned, the wings were good...but...no where near enough sauce at all. I'd come back but I guess I'd be forced to pay for extra sauce.

We like Anthony‚Äôs and Mary is a wonderful attentive server.
A hint: ask for the pizza and garlic knots to be cooked an extra minute and they come out perfect!
Well done!!
The pizza never fails to impress

HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT! AVOID THIS PLACE LIKE THE PLAGUE!
I ordered 2 calzones & these were truly inedible. Now, ive eaten many calzones in my day. Its actually one of my favorite entrees. If this place had been my 1st experience w a calzone, id never eat another one, EVER! These were excessively greasy, to the point we we sopping up grease w paper towels. The bottoms were so hard, they couldn't even be cut. One was basically burned. I took 1 bite & spit it out. All you could taste was grease. Totally disgusting.  I will NEVER be back & i HIGHLY RECOMMEND NOT EATING HERE!
2 trips in 1. First & last. ü§Æ

Always reliably super delicious.  We always get spaghetti with meat sauce and meatballs and lasagna with meat sauce.  A family favorite! Service is always prompt and super friendly.  We love Anthony‚Äôs!

detailedReviews.text: To go order was cold when picked up 5 minutes early.  $30 for the pizza is  ridiculous... Especially cold pizza.

We like Anthony‚Äôs and Mary is a wonderful attentive server.

detailedReviews.author: Heidi A
detailedReviews.text: Always reliably super delicious.  We always get spaghetti with meat sauce and meatballs and lasagna with meat sauce.  A family favorite! Service is always prompt and super friendly.  We love Anthony‚Äôs!

detailedReviews.author: deborah hanshaw
detailedReviews.text: Wonderful and delicious as usual. Great food and friendly environment always.  Best Italian food in south Carolina.

detailedReviews.author: Christopher Doyle
detailedReviews.text:
I had lunch at Anthony‚Äôs Pizza on Fairview Rd. in Simpsonville this week and was very impressed! The staff was extremely attentive, and my food was prepared quickly and came out absolutely delicious. The manager, Heather, was so sweet ‚Äî she walked around the dining room several times checking on patrons, making sure drinks were refilled and that everyone had what they needed. The entire restaurant was clean, organized, and welcoming.

If you‚Äôre in the area and looking for a great spot for lunch or dinner, I highly recommend stopping in. Everything looked amazing, but I especially suggest trying the Greek salad with lamb ‚Äî it was outstanding! I‚Äôll definitely be back for lunch again soon.

detailedReviews.author: Buffy Tipton
detailedReviews.text: Great food. Calzone was HUGE! And the fried mushrooms were amazing.  Hard working staff.

detailedReviews.author: Rick Bailey
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza, affordable prices wonderful incredible service. We go here all the time both to eat in and to take out thank you.

detailedReviews.author: Kristi Parnell
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza. Food and service was the best!

detailedReviews.author: ChaCha
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza I've found in the state

detailedReviews.author: David Dougherty
detailedReviews.text: The food at Anthony's is awesome

detailedReviews.author: Antonio Booker
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza and employees ever!

detailedReviews.author: Creek House
detailedReviews.text: Been going to Anthony's for 8 years.  When we started going it was under the original owner.  PERFECTION.  Excellent.  We have referred many people there over the years.  When it was sold, we were sad.  But we were hopeful they'd keep the same recipes for the food. That was the case UNTIL, the other day, we noticed in our lunch special 2 slices and a drink, that THINGS CHANGED! It is no longer NY style. You can tell they are trying to save money on how much they put into the lunch special. (cut a little here and there....not the same pizza)

detailedReviews.author: georg moisey
detailedReviews.text: Great place with delicious pizza and good service

detailedReviews.author: Dr. Eddie Hunt
detailedReviews.text: Great food always.

detailedReviews.author: Linda Johnson
detailedReviews.text: Always so friendly and welcoming!

detailedReviews.author: Andrea Anderson
detailedReviews.text: Great food, great atmosphere,  great SERVICE!!!

detailedReviews.author: B H
detailedReviews.text: This is a great local pizza place. The food is always hot and fresh and the staff are always nice.

detailedReviews.author: Cindy Arch
detailedReviews.text: Our family used to go here all the time until it changed owners. The sauce to cheese ratio is not good. There is never enough sauce on the pizza and too much cheese. If you order extra sauce they charge you $4.99 extra.  Hasn't anyone ever told you that the sauce cost hardly anything...maybe an extra .25 cents. At least charge the amount of an extra topping.  Why give so much cheese? If I wanted extra cheese I would order it. I have tried this restaurant several times after the new owners and have been disappointed every time. I miss the old restaurant!

detailedReviews.author: Jenna Simons
detailedReviews.text:
I get the tre colori with light sauce and basil instead of spinach. BEST pizza I‚Äôve ever had. They also have the best ranch!
I won a free medium pizza in a text lottery. They let me upgrade it to a large tri colori! With basil, of course. üòÅü•∞ I tell anyone and everyone about Anthony‚Äôs!  Awesome food, awesome atmosphere, awesome service. Every time.

detailedReviews.author: Janice Holcombe
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza and great service always

detailedReviews.author: Cloud Turner
detailedReviews.text: Very sad to say they changed their gyro meat. Before, it was far more juicy, tender, and very flavorful. Now, it looks like dried slabs of meat on the pizza. They taste not quite burnt but oddly smoky and too dry even with the olive oil.

detailedReviews.author: Anel Bajrektarevic
detailedReviews.text: Worst ny pizza place in sc lol I got served a loaf of bread for my Sicilian barely any sauce or cheese the sauce tasted horrible I wouldn‚Äôt recommend if your actually from ny idk how this place got a high rating

detailedReviews.author: Alexis Aviles
detailedReviews.text: The staff are great and the food is top notch and great service.

detailedReviews.author: Selene Seal
detailedReviews.text: OmG I don't know what their secret is but the spaghetti is out of this world!! The pizza is beyond amazing. I love this place!

detailedReviews.author: Kelly Johnson
detailedReviews.text: It's always a wonderful dining experience at Anthony's! The pizza is amazing and the other dishes I've had  are full of flavor.

detailedReviews.author: Ashley Olson
detailedReviews.text: We love the pizza!!

detailedReviews.author: Jay Tribble
detailedReviews.text: Great Pizza and fantastic lunch deals!

detailedReviews.author: Justin Kepple
detailedReviews.text: I want to start off by saying I'm a business owner and I never leave reviews good or bad ever but the way the owner conducted himself this evening w me when I called to let him know my order was wrong and I'd like a refund on my one pizza....he tried to tell me I don't know how to order a pizza and he's got a highly trained staff,  well I ordered a pizza and specifically said I want tomatoes, broccoli and ricotta cheese that's it because I've order a veggie one in the past not knowing they add mushrooms, peppers and olives on it so I made sure to be specific first time was on me for not knowing this time I made sure on the phone....get home and open it up and it's got everything on it...I call the guy and he basically tells me I'm an idiot and it's my fault I ordered it wrong mind you I never complain truly I  don't I get it but this time I had to say something because most any decent business owner would say I'm sorry we got it wrong I'll take care of it this guy?...nope so I'll take my 80 bucks i spend a week elsewhere...terrible people skills tried talking me what I said that I didn't say lol what a joke!

detailedReviews.author: Jane Cashin
detailedReviews.text: Been dining here for over 20 years! The stuffed shells with meat sauce are my favorite. People are helpful and happy to see you! Not much has changed in the decor, except for a little paint. Seat cushions could use to be re-stuffed!

detailedReviews.author: Chris Davis
detailedReviews.text: The food was great and the service exceptional!

detailedReviews.author: Alexander G Gilchrist III
detailedReviews.text: Was a Great Lunch. Food was hot and fast, service was great, they checked on us often.

detailedReviews.author: Shannon Knutti
detailedReviews.text: The minute you walk into the restaurant to pick up your order it smells amazing and everyone is in such a good mood. The servers are fantastic and the taste of the food is consistently so delicious.  Love this place!

detailedReviews.author: Deborah Sanderson
detailedReviews.text: My husband started going to Antony's Pizzeria when it first opened in 1998. They served the best pizza ever! We were concerned when Anthony sold the restaurant, but the food stay the same. Excellent! We picked up 3 extra large cheese pizzas Saturday 3/22/25 and they were terrible. The crust was thick and chewy. They did not have that amazing authentic NY Pizza flavor that melts in your mouth. I am so sad.

detailedReviews.author: Ted Allen
detailedReviews.text: We had pizza and garlic knots. As always, everything was wonderful. The pizza is our favorite by a mile!

detailedReviews.author: Ashley Atnip
detailedReviews.text: This is our family place!  You can find us here every week. The staff knows us by name, and it is the type of place that feels like home. We also cater Anthony‚Äôs for our business. Our staff looks forward to it every year!

detailedReviews.author: Elaine McClure
detailedReviews.text: Always so easy ordering from Anthony‚Äôs and the pizza is always great.

detailedReviews.author: Pete VanOrden
detailedReviews.text: I am from up north and this is the closest I have found that‚Äôs comparable to Manhattan‚Äôs pizza

detailedReviews.author: Wilfred Class
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza here in Simpsonville SC

detailedReviews.author: Colin Duffy
detailedReviews.text: Great food, fantastic service from our waitress. Cauliflower crust was amazing!

detailedReviews.author: K B
detailedReviews.text: Excellent, thin crust, crispy pizza, perfect undercarriage, and lots of flavor. Highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Richard Campbell
detailedReviews.text: Great NY style pizza. We tried this place for the first time and the pizza had good taste and the slices were huge, definitely going back.

detailedReviews.author: Christine Morley
detailedReviews.text: Fast, amazing service even during this very hectic time!

detailedReviews.author: Kathy Barnett
detailedReviews.text: Food is always hot and good. Service is prompt and wonderful staff is very courteous!

detailedReviews.author: Crystal Caldwell
detailedReviews.text: Great service! The pizza and the wings delicious as always!

detailedReviews.author: Juan Lara
detailedReviews.text: I tried their Sicilian pizza this time. Unfortunately, it was a thick square of bread with a thin layer of cheese on top. But their Neapolitan pizza slices are much better. Still, I wish they were open later.

detailedReviews.author: Anna Bennett
detailedReviews.text: Great pepperoni pizza

detailedReviews.author: Jill Morris
detailedReviews.text: My fav

detailedReviews.author: Cheryl Parker
detailedReviews.text: Always clean, friendly and fresh iced tea and hot food !

detailedReviews.author: Christie Whitmire
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza place in Simpsonville.

detailedReviews.author: Emily Caggiano
detailedReviews.text: Awesome pizza joint. Staff is always pleasant and courteous. Our favorite pizza place in town :)

detailedReviews.author: ROSALIND BURULCICH
detailedReviews.text: Used to be good - last 4 times the pizza was either burnt or tastless

detailedReviews.author: Sam
detailedReviews.text: Whomever manager i spoke to tonight was so rude and condescending it was crazy. I was being told a coupon, I got yesterday through their text promotion, was already used. When I showed them I just got it, AND was able to claim it they didn't want to honor it. I bought my pizza and left won't return.

detailedReviews.author: Tami Parks
detailedReviews.text: Anthonys pizza is the best!!! We absolutely love there food.

detailedReviews.author: Mike Anthony
detailedReviews.text: Great NY style pizza Good place for a good pie

detailedReviews.author: Lu O.
detailedReviews.text: We love Anthony‚Äôs!! We get it almost every week and sometimes twice a week! Don and Louise Varner

detailedReviews.author: George Nolin
detailedReviews.text: Always a pleasure

detailedReviews.author: Michael Stiffler
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is a little different than I am used to flavor wise. But good. Garlic knots were good.

detailedReviews.author: Carlton Manley
detailedReviews.text: Good pizza and friendly check out staff for takeout!

detailedReviews.author: Clark Smith
detailedReviews.text: Ordered a Hawaiian pizza and wings through DoorDash for me and my daughter last night. Best delivered pizza I‚Äôve ever received and best wings ever. Both delicious and cook perfectly.

detailedReviews.author: Kurt Schuetz
detailedReviews.text: Our favorite pizza in Greenville area. It‚Äôs always great and consistent. Their servers are always so kind as well!

detailedReviews.author: C√©sar Rojas
detailedReviews.text: Great food and excellent service. Price is good and lunch specials are really good!

detailedReviews.author: Willette Hollis Pearson
detailedReviews.text: Anthony's Pizzeria one of the BEST around. Always hot, fresh and made to perfection!

detailedReviews.author: Brooke Phillips
detailedReviews.text: Always a great experience with tasty food! Cheese with extra cheese pizza and Cesar salad was great.

detailedReviews.author: Christopher Haggerty
detailedReviews.text: Wings are delicious and crispy! Pizza crust is thin, crispy, and delicious with NO FLOP! Just needed a bit of Parmesan and Garlic, and it was perfect. The place smells amazing too!

detailedReviews.author: Laurence Coleman
detailedReviews.text: Anthony's ALWAYS #1 Choice

detailedReviews.author: Andrew R
detailedReviews.text: Love the gyro Mediterranean pizza, and the tiramisu is so so good (tastes just like my grandmother makes). Really glad I found this place on a business trip.

detailedReviews.author: Jennifer Lussier
detailedReviews.text: We always have great customer service here and the prices are great (especially the 2 slices and drink).

detailedReviews.author: Teddy
detailedReviews.text: Came for lunch and Pizzas was amazing, you can order by splices @ reasonable price‚Ä¶..

detailedReviews.author: Kailey Goodwin
detailedReviews.text: Good food as always and the girls serving are always so nice but these past few times the young man at the counter taking orders has not greeted us and just stares at us looking like he hates his life. Doesn‚Äôt ask what he can get for us just stares. I even say ‚Äúhey how are you?‚Äù and he just stares at me like i said something awful. Makes me want to just turn around and not interact with him. Hopefully the next time i come in it will be different but as it‚Äôs been the past few times i doubt it. No thank you nothing.

detailedReviews.author: Keith Johnson
detailedReviews.text: Great food at reasonable prices.

detailedReviews.author: Amanda Decker
detailedReviews.text:
We hadn‚Äôt stopped on an over two years before a month ago. Since then, we‚Äôve been back several times and have been so thankful we have each time. We are picky about our food and especially pizza and have not been disappointed üçïüòã!  We never bother to review anything but the new Owner ownership and/or management
has seriously turned it into a true New York Pizza stop.  And thank goodness, there‚Äôs not anything else like it around and it was needed!

detailedReviews.author: Joy Richey
detailedReviews.text: It's a regular spot for my family.  The food is ALWAYS fresh and delicious.  Customer service is A1. The prices are affordable.  I would recommend

detailedReviews.author: Angel Love
detailedReviews.text: Hands down the best pizza place in Simsponville. Great customer service and the food packs a ton of flavor.

detailedReviews.author: Steve Konradt
detailedReviews.text: We had ordered steak and cheese sandwiches.  The food was excellent.

detailedReviews.author: Jeanine Santana
detailedReviews.text:
Best pizza in
Simpsonville

detailedReviews.author: Dawn
detailedReviews.text: Not once have I ordered a pizza from here and has it not been *Chefs kiss*

detailedReviews.author: Gary Wilkinson
detailedReviews.text: We order from here to go about once a month. I live in laurens and would not go anywhere else to order pizza. Best pizza in the update that we have had.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.6/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the deliciousness and quality of the pizza, calling it the best in the state and always reliably super delicious. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The staff at Anthony's Pizza is frequently described as attentive, friendly, and hard-working, contributing to a welcoming and enjoyable dining experience. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The restaurant maintains a clean, organized, and inviting environment, which customers appreciate and mention in their reviews. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues due to food quality and customer service complaints - review management can address this concern
Changes in food quality and recipe dissatisfaction after ownership change - social media marketing can improve this area
Poor online visibility and competition with other pizza places - SEO services can solve this visibility issue

positive.author: Patricia Clark
positive.text: Had the supreme pizza. Outrageous delish

positive.author: LoLo
positive.text: We Love our Simpsonville Anthony's Pizza !! All the staff are WONDERFUL  - the Food is Awesome - it's always clean and well kept !! We continue to go back !!!

neutral.author: Bo Price
neutral.text: To go order was cold when picked up 5 minutes early.  $30 for the pizza is  ridiculous... Especially cold pizza.

neutral.author: Stephen Simko
neutral.text:
Service and staff were very polite and respectful. The restaurant was very clean with plenty of space. Parking was free and plentiful.

Food.... The wings were... Good? The wings were cooked well but absolutely no where near enough sauce. I should not have to pay extra money to get enough sauce for wings. They do a VERY light glaze of the wings with the sauce and that's it unless you pay nearly 3$ extra. Which I find crazy honestly. The pizza was good and like I mentioned, the wings were good...but...no where near enough sauce at all. I'd come back but I guess I'd be forced to pay for extra sauce.

The bottoms were so hard, they couldn't even be cut. One was basically burned. I took 1 bite & spit it out. All you could taste was grease. Totally disgusting.  I will NEVER be back & i HIGHLY RECOMMEND NOT EATING HERE!
2 trips in 1. First & last. ü§Æ

When it was sold, we were sad.  But we were hopeful they'd keep the same recipes for the food. That was the case UNTIL, the other day, we noticed in our lunch special 2 slices and a drink, that THINGS CHANGED! It is no longer NY style. negative.text: Our family used to go here all the time until it changed owners. The sauce to cheese ratio is not good. There is never enough sauce on the pizza and too much cheese. If you order extra sauce they charge you $4.99 extra.  Hasn't anyone ever told you that the sauce cost hardly anything...maybe an extra .25 cents. At least charge the amount of an extra topping. recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
